articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: F1 teams reveal special Las Vegas GP liveries - Autosport
articles.description: Formula 1 teams have rolled out a series of fresh liveries for the inaugural Las Vegas Grand Prix.
articles.content:
With interest in F1 having been fanned by the return of grand prix racing to Las Vegas, several teams have announced plans to race in different colours.
Last week Ferrari revealed it was switching t… [+1838 chars]
